# MoO Core Theme


## Standard Breakpoints
sm-viewport     (min-width:698px);
max-sm-viewport (max-width:698px);
md-viewport     (min-width:857px);
max-md-viewport (max-width:857px);
lg-viewport     (min-width:900px);
max-lg-viewport (max-width:900px);


## Color Palette
